languages.text: "Иногда сам мечтаю, Ваша Светлость. Видит Император, абордажем командовать куда как проще, чем церковью. Но Друз-Воин послал мне тактическую задачу, а значит — буду исполнять".

"Sometimes I dream about it myself, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. A boarding party is so much easier to lead than a congregation, so the Emperor be my witness. But Drusus the Warrior has given me a tactical objective, and so I'll pursue it."
languages.original_text: "Иногда сам мечтаю, Ваша Светлость. Видит Император, абордажем командовать куда как проще, чем церковью. Но Друз-Воин послал мне тактическую задачу, а значит — буду исполнять".

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes I dream about it myself, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. A boarding party is so much easier to lead than a church, so the Emperor be my witness. But Drusus the Warrior has given me a tactical objective, and so I'll pursue it."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes I dream about it myself, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. A boarding party is so much easier to lead than a congregation, so the Emperor be my witness. But Drusus the Warrior has given me a tactical objective, and so I'll pursue it."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: “有的时候我也会梦到这种事情，大人。愿帝皇为我作证，带领登舰队伍攻击敌舰，比领导教会要容易多了。不过，既然这是勇士德鲁苏斯给我指定的战术目标，那我就要尽力去实现它。”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I dream about it myself, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. A boarding party is so much easier to lead than a congregation, so the Emperor be my witness. But Drusus the Warrior has given me a tactical objective, and so I'll pursue it."

traits.locale_text: “有的时候我也会梦到这种事情，大人。愿帝皇为我作证，带领登舰队伍攻击敌舰，比领导教会要容易多了。不过，既然这是勇士德鲁苏斯给我指定的战术目标，那我就要尽力去实现它。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「私も時折夢を見るのです、陛下。乗り込み部隊を率いるのは、信徒団を率いるよりずっと簡単です。皇帝よ、我が証人となりたまえ。しかし、戦士ドラサスは私に戦術的目標を与えました。だからこそ、私はその目標を達成したいのです」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I dream about it myself, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. A boarding party is so much easier to lead than a congregation, so the Emperor be my witness. But Drusus the Warrior has given me a tactical objective, and so I'll pursue it."

traits.locale_text: 「私も時折夢を見るのです、陛下。乗り込み部隊を率いるのは、信徒団を率いるよりずっと簡単です。皇帝よ、我が証人となりたまえ。しかし、戦士ドラサスは私に戦術的目標を与えました。だからこそ、私はその目標を達成したいのです」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «A veces sueño con ello, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Un equipo de abordaje es mucho más fácil de dirigir que una congregación, que el Emperador sea mi testigo. Pero Drusus el Guerrero me ha dado un objetivo, así que lo perseguiré».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I dream about it myself, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. A boarding party is so much easier to lead than a congregation, so the Emperor be my witness. But Drusus the Warrior has given me a tactical objective, and so I'll pursue it."

traits.locale_text: «A veces sueño con ello, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Un equipo de abordaje es mucho más fácil de dirigir que una iglesia, que el Emperador sea mi testigo. Pero Drusus el Guerrero me ha dado un objetivo, así que lo perseguiré».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich träume manchmal selbst davon, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ein Entertrupp ist so viel leichter zu führen als eine Gemeinde, der Imperator sei mein Zeuge. Aber Drusus der Krieger hat mir ein taktisches Ziel vorgegeben, und das werde ich verfolgen."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I dream about it myself, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. A boarding party is so much easier to lead than a congregation, so the Emperor be my witness. But Drusus the Warrior has given me a tactical objective, and so I'll pursue it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich träume manchmal selbst davon, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ein Entertrupp ist so viel leichter zu führen als eine Kirche, der Imperator sei mein Zeuge. Aber Drusus der Krieger hat mir ein taktisches Ziel vorgegeben, und das werde ich verfolgen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Je ne vous cacherai pas qu'il m'arrive d'en rêver, Votre Seigneurie. Il est bien plus facile de mener un abordage qu'une congrégation, que l'Empereur m'en soit témoin. Mais Drusus le Guerrier m'a donné un objectif tactique et je me dois de l'accomplir. »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I dream about it myself, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. A boarding party is so much easier to lead than a congregation, so the Emperor be my witness. But Drusus the Warrior has given me a tactical objective, and so I'll pursue it."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous cacherai pas qu'il m'arrive d'en rêver, Votre Seigneurie. Il est bien plus facile de mener un abordage qu'une église, que l'Empereur m'en soit témoin. Mais Drusus le Guerrier m'a donné un objectif tactique et je me dois de l'accomplir. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Bunun hayalini ben de zaman zaman kuruyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparator şahidimdir ki borda yönetmek, kurultay yönetmekten çok daha kolay. Ancak Savaşçı Drusus bana taktiksel bir vazife verdi. Ben de bu vazifenin peşinden koşacağım."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes I dream about it myself, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. A boarding party is so much easier to lead than a congregation, so the Emperor be my witness. But Drusus the Warrior has given me a tactical objective, and so I'll pursue it."

traits.locale_text: "Bunun hayalini ben de zaman zaman kuruyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparator şahidimdir ki bir bordalama ekibini yönetmek, bir kurultayı yönetmekten çok daha kolay. Ancak Savaşçı Drusus bana taktiksel bir vazife verdi ve ben de bu vazifenin peşinden koşacağım."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
